text_raw:
1. 

(1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 
31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain 
Premises and Businesses) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 26th day of January

heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) Regulations 2020
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 296 of 2020) are amended - 

(a) 

in Regulation 3, by the deletion of subparagraph (i) in the 
definition of “relevant premises”, and 

(b) 

in the Schedule, by the insertion, in Part A, of the following: 

“8.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 296 of 2020) to make it mandatory to wear face 
coverings in post offices, credit unions and banks.
